description: Advanced guidebook generator with comprehensive frontmatter support including interactive elements, page versioning, form fields, and property system integration. Converts markdown documents to structured guidebook JSON for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.
author: Filter System

filters.name: Advanced Guidebook Generator
filters.description: Converts markdown files with advanced frontmatter to guidebook JSON format supporting buttons, forms, versioning, and property placeholders

page_types.content_pages: Navigation and content display with buttons and body text
page_types.form_pages: Data collection with various field types (textField, toggle, slider, dropdown)

interactive_elements.buttons: Clickable buttons with actions (navigation, property manipulation, custom actions)
interactive_elements.fields: Form input fields with validation and property binding
interactive_elements.events: Page lifecycle events (on_open, on_close, on_first_open, on_submit_action)

advanced_features.versioning: Conditional page content based on property values
advanced_features.nested_pages: Hierarchical page structure with automatic flattening
advanced_features.associated_blocks: Direct page access when using guidebook on specific blocks
advanced_features.pack_processing: Automatic guidebook generation from Minecraft behavior pack assets

basic_properties.title: string - Page display title
basic_properties.body: string - Main content (optional, uses markdown content if not specified)
basic_properties.showInSearch: boolean - Whether page appears in search results (default: true)
basic_properties.associated_block: string - Block identifier for direct page access
basic_properties.associated_item: string - Item identifier for creative mode item spawning

interactive_elements.buttons: array - Clickable buttons with text, action, and optional icon
interactive_elements.fields: array - Form input fields with type, label, property, and type-specific options

page_events.on_open: array - Actions triggered every time page opens
page_events.on_close: array - Actions triggered when page closes
page_events.on_first_open: array - Actions triggered only on first page visit
page_events.on_submit_action: string - Custom action for form submission

versioning.versions: array - Different page versions based on property values
versioning.version_control_property: object - Property that controls which version displays

nested_structure.children: array - Nested child pages (automatically flattened during processing)

page_type_constraints.dialog_page: exactly 2 buttons + body - Cannot have fields

required_combinations.fields: Each field requires type, label, and property definition
required_combinations.buttons: Each button requires text and action

property_definitions.validation: Property names must be unique within scope

examples.content_page: Page with buttons for navigation and content display
examples.form_page: Page with fields for data collection (settings, feedback, etc.)
examples.dialog_page: Confirmation page with exactly two choice buttons
examples.versioned_page: Page that changes content based on player properties
examples.nested_page: Page with children that get flattened into separate pages

pack_processing.description: Automatically generate guidebook pages from Minecraft behavior pack assets

process_packs.description: Enable automatic processing of Minecraft behavior pack assets

ignored_namespaces.description: Asset namespaces to ignore during processing

target_namespace.description: Primary namespace to process (leave empty to process all non-ignored namespaces)

key_list.description: Asset properties to extract from pack files

generated_content.asset_pages: Individual pages for entities, blocks, and items with name, description, and associated_item integration
generated_content.recipe_pages: Dedicated crafting recipe pages with visual patterns and ingredient lists
generated_content.index_pages: Category browsing pages for each asset type with navigation buttons
generated_content.navigation: Rich button-based navigation between related content
generated_content.tracking: Player progress tracking using on_open and on_first_open events

features: Automatic asset discovery from behavior packs (5fs: namespace by default)
Recipe extraction and crafting pattern visualization
Creative mode 'Get Item' button via associated_item
Progress tracking with player property events
Category index pages for entities, blocks, and items
Clean frontmatter with only valid specification properties
